title: Language proficiency enhancement program through transformative science learning experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science terminology and everyday problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Enhanced activities for observing and analyzing scientific phenomena in a VR environment and linking them to linguistic expression.

learning_goals: Students can explain science phenomena observed in VR simulations using logical structures of three or more levels
Learners can present cases applying science concepts to everyday problem-solving through linguistic and visual elements (images/charts)
Over 80% of participants demonstrate a 30% or greater improvement in conceptual application ability through pre-post assessment comparisons
Learners revise and develop their linguistic expressions two or more times by incorporating peer feedback from learning community activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
